thread.title: Solid NYC Hotel -
thread.title_full: Solid NYC Hotel - Review of Park Central Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: STK1124
title: Solid NYC Hotel -
text: The Park Central has a convenient location and the rooms are comfortable and clean. My bathroom is also very well-lite and spacious, which is not always the case in NYC! Front desk staff were very responsive and courteous, too. My one complaint is that the walls are thin and I had some trouble sleeping due to noise in hallways and a neighbor who had his TV on loudly.
